site_name: Sea Containers London20 Upper GroundLondonSouthwarkSE1 9PD
description: Premises Licence No. 872766 - Type of Variation sought: To vary the layout of the premises in accordance with plans (drawing number 2099-1-01-9102-Z00 03 A) supplied by the applicant. The only alteration being to licence the external bar servery as shown on the plans submitted to permit sale of alcohol. There are no changes to the other floor layouts and these remain as existing, namely drawing numbers 2099-1-01-9101-ZB1, 2099-1-01-9100-ZB2, 2099-1-01-9106-ZXX, 2099-1-01-9109-Z14, 2099-1-01-9108-Z13, 2099-1-01-9102-Z00, 099-1-01-9105-Z05, 2099-1-01-9104-Z04, 2099-1-01-9103-Z03, 2099-1-01-9107-Z12. Permitted hours and licensable activities remain as existing. To remove Condition 343 'There shall be no off sales of alcohol save for patronsseated on any private forecourt areas such as shown on the licence plans from the Premises Licence and replace with an updated condition as detailed below1.	There shall be no off-sales of alcohol in open containers, save for patrons seated on any private forecourt areas such as shown on            the licensed plans.2.	The external bar servery shall be closed by 11pm daily.
